resources.string:
Our Signature Blend Our iconic Signature Blend is the perfect combination and balance of delicate Arabica and strong Robusta beans, precisely slow roasted for a minimum of 18 minutes to ensure the beans keep their hearty flavour, rich aroma, and smooth taste.
 Hours-
 Sunday 9am–2pm
 Monday Closed
 Tuesday Closed
 Wednesday 8:30am–2:30pm
 Thursday 8:30am–2:30pm
 Friday 8:30am–2:30pm
 Saturday 9am–2pm

 Address: 114 Hollyhedge Rd, West Bromwich B71 3AH
